mentionedBy.name: Zscaler Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Simplifies management of cloud platforms including Office 365, Box, and Dropbox. Provides suite of risk assessment and threat discovery tools. Cited by Gartner's 2025 SSE Magic Quadrant at the top alongside Zscaler, Fortinet, and Palo Alto. Strong in cloud access security broker (CASB) capabilities.
